listitem.para: Modify how the updown &command; is run.

On the IKE SA responder (server), when establishing an IKEv2 Child SA, invoke the updown &command; once and asynchronously. Normally there is one invocation of the updown &command; for each combinations of the PLUTO_VERB (prepare, route, up) combined with each combinations of the Child SA's selectors.
When invoked asynchronously, the variable PLUTO_VERB will contain prepare-route-up. For more information see &ipsec-updown.8;
Assume the updown &command; is the path to an executable and invoke it directly using &exec.3;. Normally the updown &command; is invoked using /bin/sh -c.
The option updown-flags= was added in &Libreswan; 5.4.
